front.title: Extensions of for QoS Support in Transparent VLAN Services over MPLS

abstract.t: The document draft-lasserre-vkompella-ppvpn-vpls-00.txt describes asolution to support point-to-multipoint Transparent Virtual LAN(TVLAN) service over MPLS. This document describes two extensions tofacilitate the provisioning and support of Quality of Service (QoS)in TVLAN over MPLS. First, we extend the use of the VCID field in theVC-FEC to identify a VPN endpoint. Second, we use one VC-label persource/destination VPN endpoint pair. In this document, we alsoidentify a number of other mechanisms that increase the flexibilityand ease of provisioning of QoS in the TVLAN service.
